required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Role of IgE Responses to Der p 1 and Der p 2 in Chinese House Dust Mite-Allergic Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Role of IgE Responses to Der p 1 and Der p 2 in Chinese House Dust Mite-Allergic Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: One hundred patients were enrolled, based on sensitization and doctor-diagnosed allergy to HDM. Questionnaires were administered to document demographic and clinical characteristics. Serum IgE reactivity toDermatophagoides pteronyssinus (Dp) extract, Der p 1, Der p 2 and Der p 10 was measured by ImmunoCAP.

detailed_description.textblock: Background: The role of specific IgE (sIgE) against Der p 1and Der p 2 in Chinese patients with house dust mite (HDM)allergy has not yet been well investigated.Methods: One hundred patients were enrolled, based on sensitization and doctor-diagnosed allergy to HDM. Questionnaires were administered to document demographic and clinical characteristics. Serum IgE reactivity toDermatophagoides pteronyssinus (Dp) extract, Der p 1, Der p 2 and Der p 10 was measured by ImmunoCAP.

primary_outcome.description: Describe the patient's basic information in detail, including age, gender, family history, etc
Prevalence of Der p 1 Serum IgE in HDM-Allergic Patients
Prevalence of Der p 2 Serum IgE in HDM-Allergic Patients

primary_outcome.measure: Dp, Der p 1 and Der p 2
primary_outcome.description: Relationship between Serum IgE Levels of Dp, Der p 1 and Der p 2

primary_outcome.measure: Factors associated with specific IgE against Der p 1
primary_outcome.description: Study the patient's basic information and identify factors that are clearly associated with specific IgE against Der p 1

primary_outcome.measure: Factors associated with specific IgE against Der p 2
primary_outcome.description: Study the patient's basic information and identify factors that are clearly associated with specific IgE against Der p 2
Association of Specific IgE Titers with the Number of Affected Organs

study_pop.textblock: All patients were evaluated by a physician face-to-face, using a detailed questionnaire to establish the nature and severity of their clinical manifestations. The questionnaire also included demographic characteristics, a family history of allergic diseases and any other history of allergic disease.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- HDM-allergic patients reporting allergic rhinitis, conjunctivitis, asthma and/or atopic dermatitis and who had never undergone immunotherapy, were enrolled if they were sensitized to Dp as judged by ImmunoCAP ( ≥ 1 kU/l) and/or skin reaction index (SRI)by skin-prick test (SPT, a wheal diameter ≥ 0.5 mm).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who refused to participate in the study.

facility.name: Second Affiliated Hospital，School of Medicine，Zhejiang University
